subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Cubs announced Saturday that Carlos Zambrano has been placed on the 15-day disabled list with a shoulder strain, a move retroactive to June 19. Zambrano, a right-hander, is 8-3 with a 3.13 earned run average in 16 starts this season. Tests show he has a minor strain in his right shoulder. He is expected him to miss two starts.
